Title: Establishes the NYS Triangle Shirtwaist Fire 110th anniversary commemoration commission
Summary: Establishes the NYS Triangle Shirtwaist Fire 110th anniversary commemoration commission to focus attention upon the Triangle Shirtwaist Fire.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to creating the New York state Triangle Shirtwaist Fire 110th anniversary commemoration commission; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
